title: Complementary Space
textContent: Design spacing tokens semantically.

title: Gridless Design
textContent: Get rid of the grid!

title: Grids are not inclusive
textContent: Accessibility is a big part of design and while we often cite for color contrast, this only affects about 4% of the world population. To have a larger impact, we should consider the 70% of the world that doesn't speak English.

title: Shifting towards a gridless design system
textContent: What are the limitations with designing on the grid but also why these are the current norms; how to start implementing this methodology to your current design systems; and why gridless design is the designing for the future of your products.

title: What does a UX Architect do?
textContent: One question we see pop up regularly, what does a UX architect do? And when a companies or projects need to get one to improve the design process?

title: DAMATO Design System
textContent: The DAMATO design system supports the damato.design family across various web properties.

title: deltazeus
textContent: Get notified about significant weather changes in your area every day.

title: willarrive.in
textContent: A quick way to find your subway arrival time in New York City.

title: #59. Design Systems Podcast
textContent: Jen, Donnie and Chris discuss how design systems reflect the people a part of it, who use it and who maintain it; and the importance of collaboration, that systems are built for and with people.

title: Design Systems and Systems Design — what's the difference?
textContent: Outlining what both topics are to help people understand the qualities of each.

title: Design Systems Field Guide #2
textContent: Hosts Christophe Coutzoukis and Chris Strahl with special guest Donnie D'Amato!

title: Design Leader Insights
textContent: On this episode of Design Leader Insights, Alex chats with Donnie D'Amato, Principal, UX Platform - GoDaddy, about new changes in Figma as seen at Config, where the design industry is heading, and his design system advice.

title: DSSC: #7 Governance
textContent: Where we talk (mostly) about how to govern a design system team.

title: DSSC: #8 “Exotic” platforms
textContent: Where we talk (mostly) about how to support “exotic” platforms in your design system. (Think TVs, Cars, VR, etc.).

title: DSSC: #11 new tools!
textContent: Where we talk (mostly) about new design system tools.

title: DSSC: #13 Managers
textContent: Where we speak mostly about managing a design system.

title: Epic React
textContent: Confidently ship well-architected production ready React apps like a pro.

title: WAI0.1x: Introduction to Web Accessibility
textContent: Get a strong foundation in digital accessibility to make your websites and apps work well for people with disabilities, meet international standards, and provide a better user experience for everyone.

title: INCLTEACH1x: Inclusive Teaching: Supporting All Students in the College Classroom
textContent: Explore the principles of inclusive teaching and learn how to apply them in your classroom to support diverse learners.
